name: TEST LABS GLADIATOR
description:
HOW LONG WILL YOU SURVIVE?

_____________________________________

In this game, you are a goo creature brought to life by Test Labs Inc. ! To survive you must first endure the many tests run on you within the test chamber. But... be careful! You might not be the only test experiment in there! 

Collect Coins to customise your character and compete with your friends to see who is truly the Test Labs Gladiator.

_____________________________________

Instructions for install:
  1. Download the 7Zip file.
  2. Right Click > Extract Files
  3. Go to the location the files were extracted to
  4. Open the folder and open the "Test Labs Gladiator.Exe"

_____________________________________

Leave a comment down below with how you found the game and your own personal rating if you'd like? Thank you, we really appreciate It!
